column1: Little Goat Diner////The first time I went
column2: I had the Bull's Eye French Toast. Prime example of why I appreciate this place: its' french toast with an egg cooked right into the toast
column3: with fried chicken and strawberries on top to compliment. You won't find this dish anywhere else. On my last trip
column4: I had the Fat Elvis waffles
column5: which consisted of waffles with bananas
column6: peanut butter butter (you read that correctly)
column8: and syrup. It was the absolute perfect way to rejuvenate after NYE. Both items were outstanding.
